page.title: 06LEISURE TIME
page.content: LEISURE TIME IN OUR AREA IS SPENT IN A VARIETY OF WAYS.THE LANDSCAPE ITSELF OFFERS THE JOYS OF WALKING AND CLIMBING TO MANY PEOPLE.THE VARIOUS FACILITIES IN THE AREA FOR RECREATION INCLUDE,1 CRICKET FIELD,1 RUGBY AND SOCCER FIELD,1 YOUTH CLUB,1 BOYS CLUB, 1 BINGO HALL AND A THEATRE.MUSIC PLAYS A GREAT PART IN THE PEOPLE'S LIVES IN THIS AREA,SO WE HAVE,2 BRASS BANDS AND 2 CHOIRS.THE YOUTH CLUB IS USED AS A COMMUNITY CENTRE DURING THE DAY, OFFERING VARIOUS CLASSES.IN THE EVENING THE COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL IS USED BY MANY PEOPLE ATTENDING DIFFERENT CLASSES EG.POTTERY,KEEP_FIT, SWIMMING,WINE_MAKING ETC.THERE IS ALSO A LOCAL SCOUT MOVEMENT WHICH USES TREORCHY PRIMARY SCHOOL.2 SNOOKER HALLS AND TWO BOWLING GREENS PROVIDE EXTRA RECREATION.
